definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
lit. a bunch of flowers poked into a pile of manure/fig. a terrible shame (as when a lovely woman marries an odious man)
pinyin: xian1 hua1 cha1 zai4 niu2 fen4 shang4

sentences.english: Trees turn green and flowers start to blossom.。
sentences.chinese: 樹變綠了，鮮花也開始綻放。

sentences.english: Lies are like flower in full bloom; they look beautiful but do not last long.
sentences.chinese: 謊話像盛開的鮮花，外表美麗，生命短暫。

sentences.english: Flowers bloom all over our campus.
Keep a potted plant or fresh flowers at your desk.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在辦公桌上放一盆綠色植物或一束鮮花。

sentences.english: Campuss of autumn of blossoming flowers, the scent of airtime, charming.
sentences.chinese: 秋天的校園鮮花朵朵，爭奇鬥豔，芬芳迷人。

sentences.english: The beautiful topiary trees are witnesses of our marriage.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫鮮花柱見證我們的婚盟約誓。

sentences.english: He disbursed the flowers to the pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他把鮮花分發給小學生們。

sentences.english: He tried to atone for his rudeness by sending her flowers.
sentences.chinese: 他想送些鮮花給她來彌補自己的粗魯無禮。

sentences.english: Those flowers and fruits on the tea-table are our presents for you.
sentences.chinese: 桌上的鮮花和水果是我們送給您的禮物。

sentences.english: With trees and flowers everywhere, living conditions can be improved.
sentences.chinese: 到處師母環繞鮮花芬芳，生活條件就得到極大的改善。

sentences.english: 'A friend will add beauty to your life, Like a sweet scented flower.
sentences.chinese: 朋友就像芬芳怡人的鮮花，總會爲你的生活增添光彩。
她喜歡氣味芬芳的鮮花。

sentences.english: Why not bring her a heart-shaped box of chocolates and some flowers, while you're at it?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不帶給她一些鮮花和用心形盒子裝的巧克力？

sentences.english: Suppose on the edge of a cliff is a beautiful flower, which I admire day and night.
sentences.chinese: 假如一個懸崖邊上有一朵我日思夜想的美麗鮮花。

sentences.english: Black tulips, right here in China, not anywhere else, right at the Shanghai Flower Port.
sentences.chinese: 黑鬱金香，不在別處，就在中國，在上海鮮花港。

definition: style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
to send/to give as a present
